heads.name: Dimple Yadav
heads.bio: Enjoys designing engaging visuals, coding intuitive interfaces.

heads.name: Harsh RB
heads.bio: Passionate about blending creativity with technology.

members.name: Purushottam Rajpurohit
members.bio: Shy yet talkative. Quiet yet outspoken. Calm yet feisty. Stubborn yet apologetic.

roles.title: Graphic Designers
responsibilities: Visual Content Creation: Design posters, banners, and flyers that align with event themes and organizational branding.
Brand Consistency: Ensure all designs adhere to the organization's visual identity guidelines.
Concept Development: Brainstorm and develop creative concepts for various initiatives.
Typography & Layout: Create visually balanced compositions with effective typography.

roles.title: Multimedia Producers
responsibilities: Reel and Video Production: Create engaging video content for event promotions and recaps.
Animation: Develop animations or motion graphics to enhance visual storytelling.
Audio-Visual Integration: Combine visual elements with sound design for immersive experiences.
Editing: Post-production editing to polish final video outputs.

roles.title: Coordination
responsibilities: Interdepartmental Coordination: Work closely with the Social Media Team and Event Organizers to understand design requirements.
Timely Delivery: Ensure all visual content is delivered according to project timelines.
Feedback Integration: Incorporate feedback from various stakeholders to refine designs.
Asset Management: Organize and maintain design files and resources.

roles.title: Innovation
responsibilities: Trend Research: Stay updated with the latest design trends and technologies.
Creative Experimentation: Explore new techniques and styles to push creative boundaries.
Tool Mastery: Continuously improve skills in design software and tools.
Workshops: Conduct skill-sharing sessions to elevate the entire team's capabilities.

gallery.title: New Members Recruitment Poster
gallery.description: Poster design created to attract and onboard new members into the club.

gallery.title: Social Media Posters
gallery.description: Designed a complete set of social media posters for club members including President, Vice President, Association Members, Club Heads, Coordinators, and General Members.

gallery.title: VERBO FIESTA Event Poster
gallery.description: Poster for VERBO FIESTA — an exciting verbal arena testing public speaking, debating, and creative thinking skills.

gallery.title: Code-Con Event Poster
gallery.description: Poster for Code-Con: The Ultimate Tech Challenge — featuring rounds from trivia to high-stakes coding.

gallery.title: Code-Con Competition App
gallery.description: A competition app developed for the Code-Con event to streamline registration, rounds, and live updates.

gallery.title: Plexus Web Page
gallery.description: Designed and maintained the Plexus events page to showcase upcoming and past events.

gallery.title: Plexus Reformation Day Posters
gallery.description: Posters designed to commemorate and promote Plexus Reformation Day.

gallery.title: Plexus Logo Update
gallery.description: Updated and refined the Plexus Club logo for consistency and modern design aesthetics.
